postBomMaster: INSERT INTO [dbo].[BOM_MASTER] (BM_I_CODE) VALUES (@BM_I_CODE);SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS id;
deleteBomTable: UPDATE [dbo].[BOM_MASTER] SET ES_DELETE=1 WHERE BM_CODE = @BM_CODE;UPDATE [dbo].[BOM_DETAIL] SET ES_DELETE=1 WHERE BD_BM_CODE = @BM_CODE;
getBomDetailTable: SELECT * FROM [dbo].[BOM_DETAIL] WHERE BD_BM_CODE= @BD_BM_CODE AND ES_DELETE=0
updateBomMaster: UPDATE [dbo].[BOM_MASTER] SET BM_I_CODE=@BM_I_CODE WHERE BM_CODE=@BM_CODE;DELETE [dbo].[BOM_DETAIL] WHERE BD_BM_CODE = @BM_CODE;
updateItemMaster: UPDATE [dbo].[Item_MASTER] SET I_CODENO=@I_CODENO, I_NAME=@I_NAME, I_SCAT_CODE=@I_SCAT_CODE, I_CAT_CODE=@I_CAT_CODE WHERE I_CODE=@I_CODE;
